mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.nickname, c.email, c.website, c.logo, c.ip, c.content, c.qq, c.page, c.article_id AS articleId, a.title AS articleTitle, c.status, c.email_notify AS emailNotify, c.create_time AS createTime, c.update_time AS updateTime FROM comment c LEFT JOIN article a ON c.article_id = a.id ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
